LanguageData.Apparel_1ParkaCiv.label: Civil Parka
LanguageData.Apparel_1ParkaCiv.description: A fancy winter parka for staying warm in even the coldest of temperatures.
LanguageData.Apparel_2ParkaCiv.label: Bomber Jacket
